Next Previous Already routing, please cancel previous route
//String for Onboarding screens Navigate Through Campus Make Custom Markers Add To Favorites Manage Your Profile
Fs map shows the route from your current location to any classroom at Full Sail. Click on a marker to get started. Press and hold at any location on the map to create a custom marker. To save to favorites just click the marker to see the slide-up and click the star to add it to your list To see your custom markers, favorites or change your profile click on the icon in the top left of the map.
